sourcesContent:
import create from 'zustand'

const useStore = create(set => ({
    count :10,
    abc:false,
    colorActive:'red',
    colorNot:'blue',
    plus:() => set((state) => ({count:state.count +1 })),
    clean: () => set({ count: 0 }),
    toggle:() => set((state) =>({abc:!state.abc})),
}))

export default useStore;
